title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water.
Fry the pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk the eggs and Parmesan together.
Combine the pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Add spices and cream to make the gravy.
Simmer the chicken in the gravy until thickened.
